summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Destine Inn & Suites hotel website. All major functionality working perfectly including hero slider, navigation, multi-step booking flow, gallery with lightbox, contact form, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Home page loads with hero slider and navigation
Hero slider auto-rotation and manual controls work
Navigation to all 8 pages (Home, Rooms, Amenities, Gallery, Nearby, Restaurants, About, Contact)
Rooms page displays 3 room types with correct pricing ($99, $119, $109)
Complete 3-step booking flow with confirmation page
Date pickers and room selection work in booking
Guest information form validation and submission
Payment form with policy checkbox (UI only)
Gallery page with category filters (All, Rooms, Beach, Pool, Exterior)
Gallery lightbox modal with navigation controls
Contact form submission with success message
Mobile responsive design with hamburger menu
Mobile navigation menu with all links
Hero buttons and CTAs work on mobile
Footer links all present and functional
